author: asmuts
msg: (1) Added the ability to inject a custom event queue. You simply specify the classname as the type.
(2) Added the ability to share a connection pool amongst different JDBC disk cache instances.

author: apetrelli
msg: Upgraded to Maven Site plugin version 2.0-beta-8-SNAPSHOT.

author: asmuts
msg: Can now use custom event queues.
Can share a connection pool amongst JDBC Disk Cache instances.
